name: skyrail
description:
skyrail is a 3-5 minute walking sim. hop aboard and explore the cars of this mysterious train.

this is a very rough and short walker made for class. there is no 'ending', just explore to your heart's content! i may return to it and include my own assets/further development in the future! in the meantime, thanks for playing!! :))

CREDITS:

  • all models credited in the readme are from the Unity Asset Store (Standard Unity Asset Store EULA)
  • micco. (2020). ‘[free for profit] lofi type beat ~ the other night’ on YouTube
  • Bababouy (2019). ‘Bababouy’ on YouTube
  • Taavhaap on FreeSound (2020). 'Relaxing Forest Birds Chirping in the North Woods', Attribution License

CONTROLS:

WASD and mouse for movement

E to interact with ! symbols

just walk on through the doors, no interaction needed :)
